name: Ch19ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Gerik;Neimi, wait a moment.|Is that mirror what I think it is?
speak;Neimi;Huh?|Oh, this?|It's just something my grandfather gave me...
speak;Gerik;That craftsmanship!|Those engravings on the handle!|Only one person could have made that—the legendary archer Zethla!
speak;Gerik;What?!|Your grandfather was THE Zethla?|The Single Arrow Archer himself?!
speak;Neimi;Y-yes...|I didn't know he was so famous...
speak;Gerik;Famous?|His stories are legendary among mercenaries like me!|They say he could hit any target with just one arrow, no matter the distance.
speak;Gerik;He once took down an entire bandit gang with just one arrow...|And shot an apple off a tree from over three hundred paces!
speak;Neimi;That sounds like Grandpa...|But to me, he was just... Grandpa.|He taught me how to use a bow and told me stories before bed.
speak;Gerik;And he gave you this mirror?|Do you know why?
speak;Neimi;He just said I should always keep it with me...|That I should never lose it.
speak;Gerik;Ah, so he didn't tell you.|Zethla used a mirror like this in battle!|It wasn't just for checking his appearance.
speak;Gerik;He would use it to see around corners...|To spot enemies hiding in trees or behind rocks.|Even to signal his allies with reflected sunlight!
speak;Gerik;With a mirror and a bow, Zethla could control any battlefield.|No wonder he wanted you to keep it with you always.
speak;Neimi;I never knew...|So that's why he made me practice holding it at different angles!
speak;Gerik;Exactly!|You should try using it the way he did.|It might improve your archery even more.
speak;Neimi;I will!|Thank you for telling me about Grandpa, Gerik.|I miss him so much...
speak;Neimi;I-I'm sorry...|I promised myself I wouldn't cry anymore...
speak;Gerik;Don't apologize.|Those are tears worth shedding.|Your grandfather's legacy lives on in you, Neimi.
